mapper.select: select p.*, sp.schedule_start, sp.schedule_end, tp.together_start, tp.together_end, m.map_place from post p full outer join schedule_post sp on p.post_no = sp.post_no full outer join together_post tp on p.post_no = tp.post_no full outer join map m on p.post_no = m.post_no where p.post_no = #{postNo}
